artist: Engraver: Thomas Goff Lupton; Painter: after Gilbert Stuart; Publisher: Hurst, Robinson & Co.
creditline:
The William M. Ladd Collection
Gift of Herschel V. Jones, 1916
inscription: LL: Painted by G. Steuart [sic]. | LR: Engraved by T. Lupton / 6 St. James\'s Place Clerckenwell | BC: Richard Earlom Esqr. / London: Pub. by Hurst, Robinson, & Co. Successors to J. & J. Boydell. Feb\'y. 1819.
portfolio: From Frontispiece in Liber Veritatis, vol. 2
title: Portrait of Richard Earlom Esq.
